author: Jonathan Lundeen

text:
"What do you mean, you don't know?
"...You haven't realized it yet?
"The thing you've been fighting, this whole time...
"You should already know what it is, where it came from...
"You, of all people, have no right to feign ignorance any longer..."
Bit of original monologue I've had around for a couple months.

text:
Parasite Eve 1 and 2 are really underrated.
But back then with other horror games like Resident Evil and Silent Hill the competition was much bigger than it is now.
kinda strange that the most popular and known horror games are from Japan.

author: Sephiko

text: Running away from U.B. (Ultimate Being) in the end scared me the first time I played this game. :P Classic Shimomura here when she goes for darker songs. It could fit right into a Kingdom Hearts soundtrack, especially the panning notes going from low to high at 2:38. I just noticed she uses that a lot in final bosses like in KH2, Mario&Luigi 3's final boss, Live a Live's final boss and maybe more.
